title: Tiffin service near college? [RR Campus]
content: As the title says, I'm looking for a tiffin service near college- I pay some money every month, I get get to eat food at their place. I know there are alternatives, but pls just suggest any decent tiffin places near RR campus.

comments.body:
Sutta galli has 2 such tiffin centres. not sure tho, gotta check.

try to inquire around
